descriptionEn: Compiles an Angular app into an output directory named dist/ at the given output path. Must be executed from within a workspace directory.
description:
Compiles an Angular app into an output directory named dist/ at the given output path. Must be executed from within a workspace directory.

把 Angular 应用编译到给定输出路径下名为 dist/ 的输出目录中。此命令必须在工作空间目录下执行。
